text: Malandra Elizabeth Burrows (née Newman; born 4 November 1965) is an English actress and singer. She is best known for portraying the role of Kathy Glover in ITV soap opera Emmerdale (1985–2001, 2005). ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1983 Brookside Sue Episode: "Campaign Plan" 1985 Lisa Morrissey 2 episodes 1985–2001, 2005 Emmerdale Kathy Glover Regular role; 1,531 episodes 1998 Emmerdale: Revenge Spin-off film 2002 The Weakest Link Herself Contestant; 1 episode 2004 Simply the Best Contestant; 2 episodes 2006 I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! Contestant (series 6) 2022 Lorraine Herself 1 episode 2023 The Big Soap Quiz Episode 12 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Interview post leaving Emmerdale Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:English stage actors Category:English singers Category:Actors from Liverpool Category:Singers from Liverpool
title: Malandra Burrows
